snippet.title: Lastone: Behind the Choice Teaser 2021
snippet.description:
A group of people gathers in an unknown place, not knowing why they are here and where they actually are. The only thing they know about this place is 'to leave this place, one has to win a match against the ruler of the realm'.

Play through the campaign to discover the stories of the characters, then help them challenge Lucifer to leave out of there. Or play casually in the free play and test your skills in several different difficulties.

---
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1844990/Lastone_Behind_the_Choice/
Itch.io: https://dragonemperors.itch.io/lastone
